AIRX.OL.summary: Airthings ASA, together with its subsidiaries, develops, produces, markets, and sells radon measurement, indoor air quality, and energy efficiency monitors worldwide. The company operates through Consumer, Airthings for Business, and Pro segments. It offers digital radon detectors, as well as smart indoor air quality monitors and solutions for homes, schools, offices, restaurants, and other commercial buildings. The company provides its products under the View Plus, Wave Plus, Wave Mini, Wave, House Kit, Home, Hub, Plus, and Pro brands. It also serves homeowners, consumers, businesses, and professionals. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

KIT.OL.summary: Kitron ASA, an electronics manufacturing services company, together with its subsidiaries, develops, industrializes, and produces electronics for the energy/telecoms, defense/aerospace, offshore/marine, medical device, and industry sectors. It manufactures electronics that are embedded in the customers' products; and box-built electronic products. The company's services include development services, such as product development, product management, re-engineering, and value analysis/value engineering; and industrialization services, including prototype manufacturing, evaluation of new products, component engineering and database, test development, design and build of high level assembly lines, and environmental durability testing. Its services also comprise sourcing and procurement services; manufacturing, assembling, and testing of electronic products for the professional market; redesign, repair, and maintenance; logistics and distribution; and augmented reality manufacturing services. The company provides its products and services in Norway, Sweden, Lithuania, Germany, Poland, China, the United States, and internationally. Kitron ASA is headquartered in Billingstad, Norway.
